text: You know, there is a charity called Save the Children.  It's a great charity and supports kids.  Even a few cents helps.
Hi, yeah I have heard about this charity and will be considering making a donation to them.
That's great! Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief, and helps support children in developing countries.
I was thinking about making a donation of about 30 cents to the organization.

That would be great.  Right now, there is still a lot to do in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria and small donations will help a lot of children and their families. We all have a responsibility to help.
Yes I agree it is doing gods work and makes a difference to make even a small donation to them.
How much money do you spend on unnecessary things like snacks or candy? Money can be used in more meaningful ways.
only about 5-10 dollars per two weeks. I am more of a healthy eater. I have to watch my diet too.
Every little bit helps, but for the price of a dollar a day, you can sponsor a Save the Children child in need in the US or abroad.
Yes I agree, money should be used for more important issues.
Save the Children is a reputable organization; more than 90% of their money goes towards the children they are helping, so you can also be confident that your money is going where it should.
i heard that they are very legitimate. I am definitely making a donation to help them of 0.30 cents.
That sounds great! The organization helped more than 157 million kids last year and your donation will help one of them. Do you know how to donate?
sure do. I plan on making the donation after this study is completed.
OK.  Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment, and you can choose any amount, all the way up to $2, if you want to donate more than 30 cents.
yeah I I know I can. I might consider also making a larger donation to 0.50 cents. but I think 0.30 cents is adequate to help out some of the children.
Well, anything helps. The research team will collect all of the donations and send them to Save the Children.
ok. that sounds legitimate to me. I want to help children and make my money go to good use.
Small donations will help a lot of childrens and their families and your donation will certainly help.
any means to be helpful and make a difference in others lives is what I care about the most.
